markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Remove Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3675) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Amp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=425" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27</row>

</column>

---

Your spell reaches into the mind of a creature and removes you from it. The amped cantrip must be one that has one or more targets and must either require a spell attack roll or have a saving throw. Use this amp in place of the psi cantrip's normal amp entry.
name: Remove Presence
